[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/context](./context.md) &gt; [ResolutionOptions](./context.resolutionoptions.md) &gt; [optional](./context.resolutionoptions.optional.md)

## ResolutionOptions.optional property

A boolean flag to indicate if the dependency is optional. If it's set to `true` and the binding is not bound in a context, the resolution will return `undefined` instead of throwing an error.

**Signature:**

```typescript
optional?: boolean;
```
